title: Further Previews of Clementhorpe
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders have just released further previews of the Clementhorpe family on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020023612/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). This is intended to be one of our major releases for mid-year, offering a substantial family of different faces and weights, aimed at text and display use.

Look out for the detailed .pdf preview at the ottom of the log post.
author: Rasendyll
